title: Sample
description: Encodes basic information about any experimental sample material

id.description: A string uniquely identifying this sample

collection.description: A CV term describing the top-level collection containing this sample (e.g. HMP, NeMO, HMBR, etc.)

sample_type.description: A description of the type of this sample (e.g. 'cheek swab')

source_taxonomy.description: Systematic taxnomic information describing the organism(s) from which this sample was obtained

source_anatomy_or_product.description: A description of the anatomical part or body product from which this sample was derived (e.g. 'front of nose', 'stool', 'saliva')

comment.description: A generic placeholder for any text comments accompanying this sample

produced_by.description: The ID of the event that produced this sample

processed_by.description: An array of IDs of events that processed this sample

part_of_study.description: An array of IDs of all studies and sub-projects to which this sample belongs (EXCLUDING the top-level dataset already described by this sample's 'collection' property)

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make this sample 'taggable'

_search.description: An object containing additional (unstructured) data to enhance searching
